title: Pebbo: AI baby product scanner
description: Pebbo: AI Baby Product Scanner – Smart & Safe Parenting A must-have app for parents of babies & toddlers (0-8 years)! 👶✨ How to use? 1. Scan or upload the product back label using Pebbo. 2. Get instant AI analysis. 3. Find out if it’s good for your baby.
